text: Dr. Burgess Weekly Video Address November 22, 2013
label: BODY

text: “My Health Care Solutions”
label: BODY

text: Hello, this is your congressman, Michael Burgess. I’ve been a doctor for over 25 years, and I
label: BODY

text: know that our health care system needs improvements. But before can we talk reform,
label: BODY

text: Americans need the opportunity to make their own health care decisions, and the president’s
label: BODY

text: patched-up health care law will not give Americans the health care they want – and it does
label: BODY

text: come at the expense of their freedom.
label: BODY

text: The Affordable Care Act was carelessly drafted behind closed doors. It included secret deals,
label: BODY

text: loopholes, special interests, drafting errors, and allowed all federal agencies to be created
label: BODY

text: without Congressional knowledge or oversight. The bottom line is the Affordable Care Act was
label: BODY

text: not meaningful reform. There is no way that this law will improve your health or your health
label: BODY

text: care or reduce costs. In fact it’s going to cost you plenty.
label: BODY

text: With health care on so many people’s minds, I wanted to share with you a few of my ideas for
label: BODY

text: what we could do in health care. If we really want to help with cost, we need a series of changes
label: BODY

text: involving specific problems which include the inequities in the tax code. We should give
label: BODY

text: Americans the ability to purchase health insurance across state lines to increase competition.
label: BODY

text: Also people should be allowed to use their Health Savings Account to offset these very high
label: BODY

text: deductibles we’re seeing.
label: BODY

text: For better health care coverage, we should encourage and expand state solutions for people with
label: BODY

text: pre-existing conditions. Some medical liability reform would also be nice.  All of this will
label: BODY

text: maintain a patient centered approach to health care and represent the meaningful type of reform
label: BODY

text: that people have been seeking.
label: BODY

text: If you are interested in learning more about my health care ideas, please visit my health caucus
label: BODY

text: website at health.burgess.house.gov. There you will be able to learn more about solutions and
label: BODY

text: prescriptions for health care reform. Thank you for taking the time to listen. May God bless you
label: BODY

text: and your family, may you stay in good health, and as always, may God bless Texas.
label: BODY
